commonBlocks.text:
Marston Properties Ltd are Cyber Essentials certified, demonstrating our commitment to following best practice in information security.

Cyber Essentials is a Government backed scheme, launched June 2014, that helps businesses protect themselves against a range of the most common cyber attacks and provides a foundation of basic measures that we have implemented to significantly reduce our vulnerability to these threats.

The framework helps to protect the confidentiality, integrity and availability of data stored on our devices which connect to the Internet.
